contract_title: Test File Organization & Testing Infrastructure Cleanup Mission

contract_details.description: Comprehensive test file organization mission focusing on consolidating scattered test files, eliminating duplicate test code, standardizing test patterns, and creating a maintainable testing infrastructure.
contract_details.background: Agent-8 specializes in testing and quality assurance. This contract addresses the critical need for test file consolidation to improve testing efficiency and maintainability.
objectives: Analyze all test files for organization and duplication patterns
Consolidate scattered test files into logical groupings
Eliminate duplicate test code and fixtures
Standardize test file naming and organization patterns
Create shared test utilities and helper functions
Implement consistent test patterns and conventions
Validate test consolidation doesn't break test coverage
deliverables: Test file organization analysis and consolidation report
Consolidated test file structure with logical groupings
Shared test utilities and helper libraries
Standardized test naming and organization patterns
Test coverage validation and maintenance reports
technical_requirements: Test framework analysis and organization tools
Test file organization and refactoring tools
Test data management and fixture tools
success_criteria: Test files organized into clear logical groupings
Shared test utilities created for common patterns
Test naming conventions standardized across all files
Test coverage maintained at >85% after consolidation
Zero test functionality regressions from reorganization

dependencies: Test file inventory and analysis completed
resources_required: Test framework analysis and organization tools
Code coverage and quality analysis platforms
Test file organization and refactoring utilities
Test data management and fixture libraries

contract_history.details: Created test file organization and cleanup contract for Agent-8 (Medium Priority)
